item.title: Basel II on Incremental Risk Charge(IRC): Quick Links
item.description: Basel Committee on Banking Supervision(Jan, 2009). Guidelines for computing capital for incremental default risk in the trading book. Consultative document. January. IRC Comments by RiskMetrics
